Name: Image.RGBSubpixel
Desc: Simulates RGB subpixel rendering on the image.
LongDesc: The RGBSubpixel method emulates the appearance of RGB subpixel layouts found in LCD screens. It supports different layouts, glow, and screen bleed effects for realistic display simulation.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 320, height: 240 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.RGBSubpixel({ subpixelLayout: 'rgb', subpixelGlow: true }); });
